description:
The medicine Sanetoshi provides manages to save Himari from her death bed, but Shouma still feels guilty for what happened to Ringo`s sister, and tries to avoid her however possible. When Ringo tries to meet with him instead, he tells her that it is probably a good idea for them to not meet anymore.
On the other hand, Kamba is off trying to get the money to pay for the medicine that saves Himari - he manages to do so, but after paying Sanetoshi he asks when Himari can be released from the hospital... only to receive a rather mysterious answer.
Source: Official Site
